service.title: Heat Diffusion
service.author: Daniel Carlin
service.description: Accepts a network with node heats, and propogates the heat along edges to create a new heat layout

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: The upper bound on the exponential multiplication performed by diffusion

parameters.name: normalize_laplacian
parameters.description: If True, will create a normalized laplacian matrix for diffusion

parameters.name: input_attribute_name
parameters.description: The key diffusion will use to search for heats in the node attributes with

parameters.name: output_attribute_name
parameters.description: Will be the prefix of the _rank and _heat attriubtes created by diffusion

input.label: Input
input.description: An input network with heat values attached to nodes

output.label: Output
output.description: An output network with new heats and a rank attribute created by diffusion
